comment: /**  * Merges the state of the current key for the given source namespaces into the state of  * the target namespace.  *  * @param target The target namespace where the merged state should be stored.  * @param sources The source namespaces whose state should be merged.  *  * @throws Exception The method may forward exception thrown internally (by I/O or functions).  */
code: /**  * Merges the state of the current key for the given source namespaces into the state of  * the target namespace.  *  * @param target The target namespace where the merged state should be stored.  * @param sources The source namespaces whose state should be merged.  *  * @throws Exception The method may forward exception thrown internally (by I/O or functions).  */ void mergeNamespaces(N target, Collection<N> sources) throws Exception.
